name: Postmortem Hero
description:
You've spent your whole life training to become an officially licensed member of the Hero League, only to wind up getting killed on your first day on the job! So tragic!! You weren't even an official member of the League long enough to be granted access to Hero Heaven...

But you are ever resilient! You will continue your work as a ghost in the world of the living until you prove that you are a truly Glorious Hero. A Hero who should totally be allowed to hang out in Hero Heaven whenever they want!!

Features:

  • Use your ghostly powers to possess the minds of your peers and acquire their skill-sets
  • Fight monsters and perform community service tasks while inhabiting other people's bodies

A game by SistineDisco, made for Ludum Dare 35.

Created with Enterbrain's "RPG Maker VX Ace" engine, art assets, and audio.

Check out the Ludum Dare 35 submission page!
